basic.floral_language:
Bombax ceiba
Floriography: precious, warm, beautiful 
Bombax ceiba is the city flower of Guangzhou. Stems robust, early spring flowering before leaf, flower clusters in the end, petals five, fleshy, elliptic, red or orange red, flowers on the tree is like fire, also called "hero flower". 
Bombax ceiba like sufficient sunlight place. Flowering from March to April, available for viewing for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period March-April, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color red or orange red

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer to avoid root rots
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, dilute fertilizers following instructions,  in early summer, spring and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
